complexityAnalysis.expansionPrompt: Break down the Error Handling Framework task into 6 subtasks covering error categorization, retry strategies, circuit breakers, error reporting, automated recovery, and exception handling patterns. For each subtask, provide a title, description, dependencies, and detailed implementation requirements.
complexityAnalysis.reasoning: This task involves complex fault tolerance mechanisms requiring sophisticated error handling patterns, recovery procedures, and integration with multiple system components. The high complexity stems from the need to handle various error scenarios across distributed components while maintaining system reliability.

complexityAnalysis.expansionPrompt: Break down the Scalability and Performance task into 7 subtasks covering load balancing, sharding strategies, caching implementation, horizontal scaling, performance testing, bottleneck identification, and auto-scaling capabilities. For each subtask, provide a title, description, dependencies, and detailed implementation requirements.
complexityAnalysis.reasoning: This task requires deep architectural expertise across multiple dimensions of system performance and scalability. It depends on numerous completed components and must address complex technical challenges like distributed caching, load balancing, and auto-scaling while maintaining system integrity.

complexityAnalysis.expansionPrompt: Break down the Gap Assessment Agent task into 6 subtasks covering gap analysis algorithms, priority ranking system, recommendation generation, DORA article mapping, policy language suggestion engine, and effort estimation. For each subtask, provide a title, description, dependencies, and detailed implementation requirements.
complexityAnalysis.reasoning: This agent requires sophisticated analysis capabilities to identify compliance gaps, prioritize them, and generate actionable recommendations. It builds on the Policy Analyzer and must integrate with DORA requirements database while providing business-critical outputs for CIOs.

complexityAnalysis.expansionPrompt: Break down the Risk Calculator Agent task into 7 subtasks covering penalty calculation models, implementation cost estimation, ROI analysis algorithms, business case generation, financial impact visualization, executive reporting, and sensitivity analysis. For each subtask, provide a title, description, dependencies, and detailed implementation requirements.
complexityAnalysis.reasoning: This agent involves complex financial modeling, cost estimation, and business case generation requiring both technical and financial domain expertise. It must accurately calculate potential penalties, implementation costs, and ROI metrics while producing executive-ready documentation.

complexityAnalysis.expansionPrompt: Break down the Implementation Planner Agent task into 6 subtasks covering project plan generation, timeline estimation, resource allocation algorithms, dependency mapping, milestone tracking, and visualization generation. For each subtask, provide a title, description, dependencies, and detailed implementation requirements.
complexityAnalysis.reasoning: This agent requires sophisticated project management capabilities to convert gap assessments into actionable project plans with accurate timelines and resource requirements. It must handle complex dependency mapping and generate visualizations while integrating with project management methodologies.

complexityAnalysis.expansionPrompt: Break down the Assessment Dashboard & User Interface task into 7 subtasks covering UI framework setup, document upload interface, real-time analysis visualization, compliance scoring display, gap exploration interface, financial impact visualization, and report generation. For each subtask, provide a title, description, dependencies, and detailed implementation requirements.
complexityAnalysis.reasoning: This task involves creating a sophisticated React.js interface with multiple interactive components, real-time updates, data visualization, and report generation capabilities. It must integrate with multiple backend agents and present complex compliance data in an executive-ready format.

complexityAnalysis.expansionPrompt: Break down the Document Processing & AI Integration Layer task into 5 subtasks covering document extraction pipeline, AI model integration, prompt engineering, response validation, and multi-format/language support. For each subtask, provide a title, description, dependencies, and detailed implementation requirements.
complexityAnalysis.reasoning: This task requires building robust document processing capabilities and integrating with sophisticated AI models. It must handle various document formats, implement structured prompts, validate AI responses, and support multiple languages while ensuring error resilience.

complexityAnalysis.expansionPrompt: Break down the ICT Risk Management Agent task into 6 subtasks covering risk discovery mechanisms, vulnerability scanning integration, risk scoring algorithms, enterprise risk management integration, continuous monitoring, and DORA compliance alignment. For each subtask, provide a title, description, dependencies, and detailed implementation requirements.
complexityAnalysis.reasoning: This agent requires sophisticated risk assessment capabilities, vulnerability scanning integration, and alignment with complex DORA requirements (Articles 6-15). It must perform continuous risk discovery and integrate with enterprise systems while providing accurate risk scoring.

complexityAnalysis.expansionPrompt: Break down the Incident Management & Reporting Agent task into 7 subtasks covering incident detection algorithms, classification system, impact assessment, regulatory reporting automation, cross-border coordination, timeline management, and remediation tracking. For each subtask, provide a title, description, dependencies, and detailed implementation requirements.
complexityAnalysis.reasoning: This agent must handle real-time incident detection across complex infrastructure, implement sophisticated classification per DORA taxonomies, assess impacts, and automate regulatory reporting within strict timelines. It requires integration with multiple systems and compliance with Articles 17-23.

complexityAnalysis.expansionPrompt: Break down the Digital Resilience Testing Agent task into 7 subtasks covering vulnerability assessment automation, penetration testing orchestration, TLPT coordination, business continuity testing, performance testing, test scenario generation, and remediation tracking. For each subtask, provide a title, description, dependencies, and detailed implementation requirements.
complexityAnalysis.reasoning: This agent must orchestrate complex testing activities including vulnerability assessments, penetration testing, and TLPT per Articles 24-27. It requires integration with external red teams, sophisticated test scenario generation, and compliance with multiple testing frameworks including TIBER-EU.
